    • bbsBuildArtifacts: comparing BBS states over time

acquire data on a package's BBS state

Source: R/bbs_package_data.R
host_data_by_phase.Rd

acquire data on a package's BBS state

host_data_by_phase(bbspd, host, phase)

Arguments

bbspd

instance of BBS_package_data

host

character(1) valid host name for BBS

phase

character(1) valid phase

Examples

af = make_demo_ArtifSet()
#> starting untar...
#> done.
pd1 = make_BBS_package_data(af, "SummarizedExperiment")
hd = host_data_by_phase( pd1, "nebbiolo2", "buildsrc")
head(hd)
#> [1] "##############################################################################"                               
#> [2] "##############################################################################"                               
#> [3] "###"                                                                                                          
#> [4] "### Running command:"                                                                                         
#> [5] "###"                                                                                                          
#> [6] "###   /home/biocbuild/bbs-3.14-bioc/R/bin/R CMD build --keep-empty-dirs --no-resave-data SummarizedExperiment"
hd = host_data_by_phase( pd1, "nebbiolo2", "checksrc")
head(hd)
#> [1] "----"              "NO ERROR EVENTS"   "----"             
#> [4] "----"              "NO WARNING EVENTS" "----"             
pd2 = make_BBS_package_data(af, "affyPara")
hd = host_data_by_phase( pd2, "nebbiolo2", "install")
tail(hd)
#> [1] "  call: assign(\".affyParaInternalEnv\", .affyParaInternalEnv, envir = topenv(parent.frame()))"
#> [2] "  error: cannot add binding of '.affyParaInternalEnv' to the base environment"                 
#> [3] "Error: loading failed"                                                                         
#> [4] "Execution halted"                                                                              
#> [5] "ERROR: loading failed"                                                                         
#> [6] "* removing ‘/home/biocbuild/bbs-3.14-bioc/R/library/affyPara’"                                 
hd = host_data_by_phase( pd2, "nebbiolo2", "checksrc")
head(hd)
#> [1] "no checksrc-out.txt available for affyPara"
